rules_show.description: Show the currently configured moderation rules.

remove_action.description: Remove a specific action from the list of punishments.
remove_action.action: Exact action string to remove (e.g. timeout, delete)

toggle.description: Enable/disable moderation, view status, or set mode.
toggle.enable: Turn autonomous moderation on or off.
toggle.mode: Optional: set report / interval / adaptive mode.

view_actions.description: Show all actions currently configured to trigger when the AI detects a violation.

add_adaptive_event.description: Link a trigger event to one or more moderation mode actions.
add_adaptive_event.channel: Which channel to monitor (for spike events)
add_adaptive_event.time_range: Time range in HH:MM-HH:MM for time-based triggers
add_adaptive_event.threshold: Threshold for role online percent (0 to 1, optional)

remove_adaptive_event.description: Remove a specific action from a configured event.
remove_adaptive_event.action: Action to remove from this event

common.subscription_required: Bu sunucuda Hızlandırılmış aboneliği yok. Premium planınızı başlatmak için `/accelerated subscribe` komutunu kullanın.

toggle.need_rules: Önce `/ai_mod rules_set` ile moderasyon kurallarını belirleyin.

actions.none: Şu an için herhangi bir eylem ayarlanmamış.
actions.heading:
**Mevcut eylemler:**
{actions}

adaptive.role_required: Bu etkinlik türü bir rol gerektirir.
adaptive.threshold_required: Bu etkinlik türü bir eşik gerektirir.
adaptive.threshold_range: Eşik değeri 0 ile 1 arasında bir değer olmalıdır.
adaptive.time_range_required: Bu etkinlik türü bir zaman aralığı gerektirir (ör. 08:00-20:00).

moderator.budget_reached: AI moderation budget reached for this billing cycle. Resets at {reset}.
moderator.thanks_no_violation: Thanks for the report. No violations were found.
moderator.thanks_action: Thanks for the report. Action was taken.

fanout.name: Fan-out
fanout.value: Multiple authors detected; applied per-author actions.

no_violations.title: AI Moderation Scan (Debug)
no_violations.description: No violations were found in the latest scan.

autonomous_moderation.ensure_adaptive: Uyarlanabilir moderasyon modu etkin değil. Etkinleştirmek için `/ai_mod set_mode` komutunu kullanın.
